data: Ours is a little town in that part of the country called the West by those who live east of the Alleghanies, and referred to lovingly as “back East” by those who dwell west of the Rockies.
Ours is a little town in that part of the country called the West by those who live east of the Alleghanies, and referred to lovingly as "back East" by those who dwell west of the Rockies.
White, William Allen, 1868-1944; Glackens, William J., 1870-1938 [Illustrator]; Gruger, Frederic Rodrigo, 1871-1953 [Illustrator]
